title: Multilevel factors influence the use of a cardiovascular disease assessment tool embedded in the electronic health record in oncology care

abstract: Digital health tools are positive for delivering evidence-based care. However, few studies have applied rigorous frameworks to understand their use in community settings. This study aimed to identify implementation determinants of the Automated …
